00022 #include "Common/Mutex.h"

00029 namespace Hypertable {
00030 
00031   class OpenFileData : public ReferenceCount {
00032   public:
00033     virtual ~OpenFileData() { return; }
00034     struct sockaddr_in addr;
00035   };
00036 
00037   typedef intrusive_ptr<OpenFileData> OpenFileDataPtr;
00038 
00039 
00040   class OpenFileMap {
00041 
00042   public:
00043 
00044     void create(int fd, struct sockaddr_in &addr, OpenFileDataPtr &fdata) {
00045       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00046       fdata->addr = addr;
00047       m_file_map[fd] = fdata;
00048     }
00049 
00050     bool get(int fd, OpenFileDataPtr &fdata) {
00051       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00052       FileMap::iterator iter = m_file_map.find(fd);
00053       if (iter != m_file_map.end()) {
00054         fdata = (*iter).second;
00055         return true;
00056       }
00057       return false;
00058     }
00059 
00060     bool remove(int fd, OpenFileDataPtr &fdata) {
00061       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00062       FileMap::iterator iter = m_file_map.find(fd);
00063       if (iter != m_file_map.end()) {
00064         fdata = (*iter).second;
00065         m_file_map.erase(iter);
00066         return true;
00067       }
00068       return false;
00069     }
00070 
00071     void remove(int fd) {
00072       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00073       FileMap::iterator iter = m_file_map.find(fd);
00074       if (iter != m_file_map.end())
00075         m_file_map.erase(iter);
00076     }
00077 
00078     void remove_all(struct sockaddr_in &addr) {
00079       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00080       FileMap::iterator iter = m_file_map.begin();
00081 
00082       while (iter != m_file_map.end()) {
00083         if ((*iter).second->addr.sin_family == addr.sin_family &&
00084             (*iter).second->addr.sin_port == addr.sin_port &&
00085             (*iter).second->addr.sin_addr.s_addr == addr.sin_addr.s_addr) {
00086           FileMap::iterator del_it = iter;
00087           HT_ERRORF("Removing handle %d from open file map because of lost "
00088                     "owning client connection", (*iter).first);
00089           ++iter;
00090           m_file_map.erase(del_it);
00091         }
00092         else
00093           ++iter;
00094       }
00095     }
00096 
00097     void remove_all() {
00098       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00099       m_file_map.clear();
00100     }
00101 
00102   private:
00103 
00104     typedef hash_map<int, OpenFileDataPtr> FileMap;
00105 
00106     Mutex         m_mutex;
00107     FileMap       m_file_map;
00108   };
00109 }
